workshoptitle: Get started with Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Database Management

tutorials.title: Getting Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Setup On-Premises Environment
tutorials.description: Setup compute instance running 19c using Terraform script and Resource Manager

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Setup Pluggable Databases and workload
tutorials.description: Setup Pluggable Databases and workload to be used in exploring Database Management

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Prerequisite: Create a dynamic group and policies for agent communication
tutorials.description: Create a dynamic group and policies and set up required prerequisites for the management communication

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Download and Install the Management Agent Software
tutorials.description: Steps to download and install the Management Agent Software

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Register On-Premises Database with External Database Service
tutorials.description: Register On-Premises Database with External Database Service

tutorials.title: Lab 7: Exploring Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Database Management
tutorials.description: Exploring Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Database Management

tutorials.title: Lab 8: Setup Database Management for Oracle Cloud Databases
tutorials.description: Setup Database Management for Oracle Cloud Databases

tutorials.title: Lab 9: Setup Database Management for Oracle Autonomous Databases
tutorials.description: Setup Database Management for Oracle Autonomous Databases

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
